query:
UPDATE island_guides ig
JOIN places p ON ig.name = p.name AND (
  SELECT a.name FROM atolls a WHERE a.id = p.atollId
) = ig.atoll
SET ig.placeId = p.id
WHERE ig.contentType = 'island' AND ig.placeId IS NULL
